metadata.description: System & Information Integrity - Malware protection, system monitoring, vulnerability management - MAPPED

new_functions_suggested.description: Track and monitor flaw remediation progress across all managed systems
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced flaw remediation tracking for SI-2 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Automate testing of patches before deployment to production systems
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Automated patch testing for SI-2 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Centralized management and monitoring of malicious code protection across all systems
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Centralized malicious code protection for SI-3 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated threat response and quarantine actions for detected malicious code
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Automated threat response for SI-3 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Comprehensive system monitoring with integrated intrusion detection and threat response
Automated analysis of inbound and outbound communications traffic for security threats
